reviewText:
I do not suggest buying the DVD, but I do think this film is worth seeing. I definitely recommend it to younger people.

Having read a great many memoirs and biographies of the women agents and resistance fighters in France, for me, this film was poor in comparison.  By that I mean, the film sacrificed some valuable history here.
Absolutely stunning, marvelous movie, and it's a true story from WWII; it's now being passed from colleague to colleague within the faculty where I teach high school!
